Functions

char * get_callername (int fd)
 returns the hostname (or its ip address) on the other side of the connected socket fd. The name is contained in a static area. (note: this is rather tricky) This is used only to print nice messages about what's going on.
void get_file (int clientfd, char *filename)

Function Documentation

get_callername ( int  fd  ) 

returns the hostname (or its ip address) on the other side of the connected socket fd. The name is contained in a static area. (note: this is rather tricky) This is used only to print nice messages about what's going on.

Parameters:
fd : cnnected socket.
